description.p: A vial of weakening, enchanted acid is embedded in the arrowhead.
On a hit, the target takes 1d8 acid damage and must pass a 15 DC CON saving throw or suffer -2 to their AC and have disadvantage on CON saving throws for 3 rounds (does not stack).
Faint vibrations noticeable on contact course through the arrow.

These arrows release a thunderous explosion on hit. All creatures within a 10ft radius must make a 15 DC CON saving throw or take 2d8 thunder damage, are pushed back 5ft and fall prone. Loose objects are automatically pushed 5ft away.
Whenever the bearer deals damage to a creature, this weapon gains a charge.
As a bonus action, the bearer can use any number of charges to deal that much extra lightning damage on their next attack.
If a round (6 seconds) goes by and the weapon has not struck a foe, it loses all charges.
